website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses the competitors for offering nearly everything consumers prefer in charcoal toothpaste. Nice flavor, quality ingredients, and impressive results.
pros: Pleasant mint flavor, organic ingredients, and reports of noticeable results
Stands out for its impressive formula that also includes bamboo
cons: Consumers with heavily stained teeth may have to use it longer than typical to see results, but this is to be expected

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients listed are incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited to receive this toothpaste in the mail since it took a lot of searching to find a charcoal toothpaste product without any additives, SLS (Sodium Lauryl Sulfate), Citric Acid, or coloring. But when I opened the package, the ingredients on the box didn't match the description as advertised. In the picture attached, you'll see the product actually DOES include SLS, which is one of the ingredients you should try your hardest to avoid. If you don't know why, do some research. Very disappointed. This will be getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ottino

customer_reviews.title: I really like how clean my mouth feels after brushing with it
customer_reviews.text: I started using this toothpaste around a month ago. I really like how clean my mouth feels after brushing with it. It has a minty taste but not really overpowering like other charcoal toothpastes I've used. My 10 year old has also started using it, which is amazing because"adult" toothpaste usually is too "spicy" for her. I feel like my teeth are whiter from using this. The texture is the same as regular toothpaste. Activated charcoal is a superfine powder and not gritty at all
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved!
customer_reviews.text: Had to jump on the charcoal toothpaste craze going around! I ordered two different kinds. One for my kids bathroom and one for mine. You never know with kids but they actually love this toothpaste and so do I. It’s very minty and doesn’t leave any charcoal residue. Will reorder this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy&Dana

customer_reviews.title: This toothpaste feeling great when brushing it doesn’t make your teeth black like ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this product today and so far I am loving it! Shipping was fast! This toothpaste feeling great when brushing it doesn’t make your teeth black like other charcoal products which makes cleaning easier and it doesn’t stain your toothbrush ! It doesn’t have a strong flavor like regular toothpaste so it doesn’t have that slightly burning feeling. My teeth feel much more cleaner than when I use regular toothpaste feels like I just got my teeth cleaned by the dentist! The size of the product is great I feel like it will last me a while! I will definitely repurchase when I run out. Highly recommend this product. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, really makes your mouth feel so clean.
customer_reviews.text: This has an amazing taste to it compared to then other brand that I tried but it is not as thick and will "squirt" out of the tube if you aren't careful with the amount of pressure you are holding it with. I ended up wasting more than I'd care to admit because of this. I would still recommend it, just be careful about how hard you squeeze. My mouth has never felt as clean as it does with this toothpaste, using a fluoride toothpaste and I like knowing this is natural. One less chemical I have to worry about in my daily routines!
customer_reviews.author: K. Rich

customer_reviews.title: The Stain Busters, but also The False Advertisers
customer_reviews.text: I think I love this product. The mild minty taste and relatively smooth texture are better than I expected. And look at that smile in my mirror! To summarize: Yes, I recommend this product. :-) Update: A coupon code was sent along with my initial order. The coupon promised a free tube. I never received the tube even though I followed the coupon requirements. Sadly, I can no longer trust this company nor do I recommend that you trust them either. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: NYC-Steve

customer_reviews.title: It's organic
customer_reviews.text: Ok, the 1 star is only for the poor customer service. They provided a coupon code that never worked and last I heard is that they mail me the product. I have yet to receive the product. I have emailed asking status and no response. First time ordering this product. The box was a bit beat up and the was a bit raised, probably due to shipping. Regardless of the aesthetics I tried the toorhpaste and amazingly it felt very refreshing and continued after I finished brushing. I still feel the tingly minty sensation. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BabyCakes

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor charcoal toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: Toothpaste is great! Comes out black but brushes a light grey color. Was worried about spit staining sink, but no staining! Flavor is just the perfect amount of mint! It is making my teeth whiter and no sensitivity issues at all. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Use as directed - it works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son at his request. He over used it and it made his taste buds on his tongue swell but that was his fault for using it too many times in 1 day. I don't recommend using it more than once a day.. His teeth were white to begin with except for right around the gums and since using the toothpaste has noticeably began to whiten up. I would buy again..if he wants it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: New favorite toothpaste, horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Swore there was a difference after using it the first time. My husband's and my teeth are definitely whiter after using it!! Really like that it doesn't have fluoride! I definitely recommend this to anyone looking to get a natural whitening toothpaste. Update: I had to change my review from 5 stars to 1 stars just based on the customer service they have provided. Sent them an email over a week ago about a coupon code they sent me that ended up being expired and no one has gotten back to me at all. Very disappointed. Still over 2 months later and no response. Horrible customer service.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST TOOTHPASTE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste is really the bees-knees! I was skeptical at first because I’m really not into “fad trends” but I needed something to help whiten my teeth. I bought the powder, and it worked well but it completely took all the moisture out of my mouth and i hates that, so I looked for the liquid toothpaste and it works! It definitely made my teeth a shade whiter after just a couple of uses! I’ll be getting more!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle I have purchased. I can say that it did work in whitening my teeth, and that the taste is absolutely the best tasting toothpaste I have ever had. It is a little strange having black toothpaste at first, but you get over it pretty quick because its more than worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST toothpaste on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST toothpaste on the market. Hands down. I’ve been searching for an organic toothpaste that’s not gritty, no fluoride, and doesn’t have stevia. This toothpaste leaves your mouth feeling clean and refreshed every time with a natural minty taste. No worries, your mouth doesn’t turn all black while brushing, it’s a very subtle charcoal color as you brush and easily rinses away.
customer_reviews.author: LPS

customer_reviews.title: It works and have a good minty taste
customer_reviews.text: It works and have a good minty taste! My son says his yellowish tobacco teeth have whitened! I have to admit i used a one with fluoride before which whitened mine, but being afraid of fluoride, decided to try something natural! This one has mantained the tone, even though I would like for them to white up more! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Janice C.

customer_reviews.title: The ingredients are natural and leaves my teeth feeling clean.
customer_reviews.text: I just received the toothpaste and have used it for a few days. I alternate it with other toothpaste per day. So far I like the feeling of my teeth after brushing. I'm interested to see how long it will take to whiten my teeth. I'm impressed with the ingredients. It does not seem hard on the teeth enamel. The toothpaste does not leave my sink black.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Kleiman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this toothpaste,mild,minty(not alot) sure leave your teeth and mouth,refreshing.Also it does whiten the teeth too.
customer_reviews.author: Sassylady49

customer_reviews.title: I went off of the reviews of this product and I’m quite surprised that so many people said that they had such good results. It has a decent taste
customer_reviews.text: Use for one month and have not noticed any difference. I went off of the reviews of this product and I’m quite surprised that so many people said that they had such good results. It has a decent taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just expensive toothpaste.
customer_reviews.text: LOL I was stunned when I fiirst used it. It is black!. No problem, it rinses off. Mild taste is fine. I cannot say that I have noticed any whitening. After many toothpaste brands that claim whitening, I think my teeth are what they are.
customer_reviews.author: JoLawr

customer_reviews.title: The powder is better
customer_reviews.text: Not as effective as the powder did not white teeth , dentist believes it was the cause of a horrible gum infection
customer_reviews.author: Legrecia

customer_reviews.title: Clean as a Whistle
customer_reviews.text: I loved this toothpaste. It cleaned my teeth so well and left them feeling clean as a whistle. I couldn't tell if they were any whiter after using but this was a nice break from my baking soda regime.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Diva

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavor with no results
customer_reviews.text: Gave 2 stars bevause the taste is good and does leave mouth feeling fresh however, I seen no results after using.
customer_reviews.author: Brande Rawson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this daily since I purchased it and I don’t notice a single bit of difference. I would not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is some good stuff! Not just for dental care but works great on pimples too!
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product will buy again
customer_reviews.text: got this for my boyfriend. He loves it. Slowly getting whiter teeth and he loves the taste. He also likes that it doesnt make a mess!
customer_reviews.author: ELAINE W.

customer_reviews.title: works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this toothpaste for a few weeks now, and although it is subtle, I have noticed a difference the taste isn't bad. It doesn't stain. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: tfkent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: can already see the difference and has a nice minty taste
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: White teeth almost instantly
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a scam or lies but after one use i actually saw a diffrence in the color of my teeth. After two or three uses they were white white not pearls but good enough for photos.
customer_reviews.author: logan

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product, I’ve noticed a drastic difference in the color of teeth. It really helps get rid of the coffee stains if you have any. One of my all time favorites 🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Samantha April

customer_reviews.title: ... tooth paste and this one is by far the best tasting
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many charcoal tooth paste and this one is by far the best tasting
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not gritty and has a nice mint flavor. I use this after my regular toothpaste because I don’t think my teeth feel clean enough with just this

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about the product just yet
customer_reviews.text: Started using it but wasn't consistent, one tube is not enough to judge its effectiveness
customer_reviews.author: Nga

customer_reviews.title: Not an effective toothpaste for whitening
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this product would work to whiten my teeth but it's just not very good as far as whitening. It doesnt have much of a refreshing taste either. Sorry I won't purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: jenabee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for natural teeth whitening
customer_reviews.text: I give this product to my dad and he said it’s amazing. I can see that it really helps to whiten and clean teeth. He’s extremely please that it really works.
customer_reviews.author: bradjag

customer_reviews.title: Didn't remove stain. Since you need to try this ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't remove stain. Since you need to try this for a bit to know if it works or not, you end up not being able to return/get a refund if it doesn't work. So it's unfortunate on many levels.
customer_reviews.author: JS NYC

customer_reviews.title: Whiter teeth the easy way!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I could tell the difference within three days. It has a pleasant mint taste.
customer_reviews.author: Faie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time as promised. Was a bit hesitant ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time as promised. Was a bit hesitant, but was very impressed with the smooth texture (I expected gritty), pleasant taste, and am already seeing results! Both my wife and I are fans!
customer_reviews.author: Henning

customer_reviews.title: Mouth didn't feel really clean
customer_reviews.text: Taste was ok but I didn't feel like my mouth was clean. Suggest mouthwash after use

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: I found this product on an online list of top 10 activated charcoal toothpastes. I wasn’t expecting a miracle product but this toothpaste doesn’t work at all. In fact I’ve slowly seen a decrease in the whiteness of my teeth which is highly annoying. Switching back to my old toothpaste. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Brighten Your Smile with Whiter Teeth
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product for my husband his teeth was very yellow and dull after the first week of using the product I can see his teeth lightning and returning to a better state!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not whiten teeth
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this toothpaste. It did not whiten my teeth. It was worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Julia B.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste! I was skeptical but can see the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great taste! I was skeptical but can see the difference in the whiteness of my teeth. I also notice they aren’t as sensitive; I use it 2 times a day.

customer_reviews.title: Slight difference after 1 week of use.
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a week and I see a slight difference in my smile. Will continue to use and review at a later time.
customer_reviews.author: San_83

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t whiten
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t actually whiten my teeth, but still seems like a good toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Activated charcoal toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Received it pretty fast and tried it right away, had wonderful results so quickly, flavor is great also so makes my mouth feel pretty fresh. Deff want to try other products
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Comes out black leaves teeth White!
customer_reviews.text: Comes out black, but leaves teeth white. I was a little skeptical about product, but it noticeably leaves your teeth whiter after just one use, and it's fluoride-free. Minty, but I usually use it after using my usual toothpaste, will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Morales

customer_reviews.title: at first i was skeptical about this because i’ve tried ...
customer_reviews.text: at first i was skeptical about this because i’ve tried expensive toothpastes that are supposed to whiten your teeth but after using this only 2 times i can tell a difference. definitely worth the money!!

customer_reviews.title: Waist of money.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Save yourself some money and don't buy

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a toothpaste to brighten my teeth, and this one is gentle but effective. Love the taste and noticed a difference in just a few days.

customer_reviews.title: ... time trying this brand and the taste is much better than what I've been previously
customer_reviews.text: first time trying this brand and the taste is much better than what I've been previously used

customer_reviews.title: No change in color of teeth
customer_reviews.text: The taste is good, but there’s no change in the color of my daughter(s)’ teeth in the 3 weeks of use.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just started using but I like it so far.....hopefully I will see some whitening over the next few weeks

customer_reviews.title: Great toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. My teeth and mouth feel very clean with white teeth.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and teeth feel very clean afterwards. Not much difference on the whitening but didn't expect that anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Deano664

customer_reviews.title: Merchant was very efficient and answered my questions when I inquired!
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste has far exceeded all of my expectations! It gives me a minty finish and my teeth feel clean. There is no grainy feeling. Too soon to tell if my teeth are whiter yet but I will update in a month! I think I'm done with Tom's.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon simms

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Nice taste. Kinda like wintergreen Crest. No dark coloration while using or on sink.

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well and I saw results within a week. Would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.text: love how the color of the toothpaste doesn't stay black as you brush!

customer_reviews.title: Haven't notice any change of color on my teeth they ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't notice any change of color on my teeth they still look the same, also it leaves my lips tingly after brushing.
customer_reviews.author: dean

customer_reviews.title: Good mint taste.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband but I finally tried it and although I don't need it as much as him, I will be using it as well. Once you get over the look of it, you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product!! Breath was amazing afterwards, no residuals or aftertaste.

customer_reviews.title: Actually works and really well too!
customer_reviews.text: Had yellow stained teeth that all those whitening toothpastes never fixed. This product after a few days drastically made my teeth whiter and breathe fresher.
customer_reviews.author: Ki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little less thick than my previous charcoal toothpaste, but the whitening is amazing!! I will definitely buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all! And I have no ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all! And I have no fillings it just didn't whiten your teeth, bought one for my BF and friend didn't work for them either 😒😒😒
customer_reviews.author: april koning

customer_reviews.title: Best charcoal toothpaste out there!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the taste, the texture, and the feel. I tried others, and they did not compare.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It's nice.
customer_reviews.text: Not too strong of a minty taste. Just right. Doesn't turn your mouth black like the charcoal toothpaste you see elsewhere though.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Anger

customer_reviews.title: good taste
customer_reviews.text: Charcoal everything seems to be all the fad right now. This toothpaste while being charcoal has a decent mint flavor. It also is fluoride free making it all the more impressive that it left my mouth with a clean feeling and a minty fresh taste. Fluoride free toothpastes that I’ve tried in the past have a weird aftertaste and never make my teeth feel just brushed, this however does.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the product doesn't work its a scam. don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Josiah

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had other charcoal toothpastes and I can always feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had other charcoal toothpastes and I can always feel the charcoal making a difference and when I spit after I can see the charcoal it’s black. This toothpaste looks black but I highly doubt there’s any actual charcoal and not just coloring. The labels aren’t straight. I won’t buy it again:
customer_reviews.author: Mark James Neeleman

customer_reviews.title: Better than I had hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting to try this, and i have to say I'm impressed. If you haven't tried charcoal toothpaste, I highly recommend it. After only 2 or 3 uses I could already see a difference, and now after 3 weeks my teeth look amazing! Not even a professional cleaning could get these results!
customer_reviews.author: Error 404: Customer Not Found

customer_reviews.title: and Third it tastes great! So i was pleasantly suprised
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy for the worry this would be gritty and i had imagined little sandy bits of charcoal stuck between my teeth, but what we wouldnt try for a pearly white smile?! Well, first off it WOrKS! Second, its not gritty, and Third it tastes great! So i was pleasantly suprised. Ive had my teeth professionally whitened and this has definitely maintained the bright white i was begining to loose, and improved my teeth a few shades already! Very happy. 😍
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using activated charcoal for years for various things. I’ve tried using the powder charcoal to brush my teeth but it makes a huge mess. I found this toothepaste and was excited to try it. I like that it’s organic so I know I’m not brushing my teeth with toxins. The flavor is pleasant and not overbearing. The best part- no black mess all over my bathroom! I have been using this for a few weeks and I can definitely see my coffee stains lightening up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My teeth are so much whiter. I have reduced time to once a week. I started out using it every day until I noticed a difference. Now I use it once a week to keep them white. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wies

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I know about charcoal and its properties. This tooth paste intriged me. It tastes great, isn't gritty. Left my teeth feeling clean as well as my mouth. My teeth aren't stained, but I will still keep track with a photo to see how much whitening I get. I am happy with the product and plan to refer others to try.
customer_reviews.author: Desertpunky

customer_reviews.title: My perception of a bad taste and grit are not present in this product
customer_reviews.text: As a person who has spent a fortune on my teeth I have always been hesitant to use a charcoal toothpaste. My perception of a bad taste and grit are not present in this product. Has a nice mint flavor and leaves my teeth feeling very clean. Although slowly, I do think my teeth are becoming more white.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Though it seems odd smearing black charcoal on your teeth does make them whiter!
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall Pros: whitens well taste is pretty nominal (not good or bad) Cons: does make a bit of a mess, and gets black specs all over white sinks (easy to wash up just FYI) ** Follow directions, some of these are not daily use!
customer_reviews.author: BMP

customer_reviews.title: Worked Ok for a While
customer_reviews.text: Was asked by the supplier to write a review in exchange for a coupon code. At the time the paste worked quite well and was as advertised. However, not only did the supplier not provide the coupon as promised, the effectiveness of the toothpaste di finished after a couple of weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Squire

customer_reviews.title: Nice tasting toothpaste and leaves your teeth feeling really clean
customer_reviews.text: Nice tasting toothpaste and leaves your teeth feeling really clean. Bought this for the whitening effect but so far have not noticed any difference but to be fair I have only been using it for about a month, not sure though how fast acting it is supposed to be. If it does what it is advertised to do it is well worth the price but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Nosal

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit disconcerting to put black coal in y ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit disconcerting to put black coal in y mouth, but it's okay. I'll probably go back to baking soda and peroxide when I want an extra bit of whitening.
customer_reviews.author: S Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I drink a lot of ice tea and coffee and my teeth were looking dingy. I used this toothpaste for a few weeks and there is quite a difference. Toothpaste tastes good and no mess like the powder versions.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper Miles

customer_reviews.title: So/so
customer_reviews.text: Didn't wow me with the results. I feel like whitening mouth wash brings better results. Make sure you rinse your sink thoroughly and brush as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Fresh taste and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good and seems to clean my teeth really well. My dentist advised me to only use it once a week. I prefer using charcoal from a tube vs the powder version.
customer_reviews.author: TTSJ

customer_reviews.title: Good toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Good. Tastes good, fresh feel, feels clean. No miracles with how white are teeth are but I like the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: ❤Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 3 other brands and this is the best one. The flavor last for hours and my teeth stay clean all day no matter what foods I eat.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't have a bad taste but I haven't seen any difference between this ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have a bad taste but I haven't seen any difference between this toothpaste and your usual "whitening" toothpastes.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Rounds

customer_reviews.title: 100% guarantee
customer_reviews.text: I compared many charcoal products, read reviews & picked this one because this one was the only one that had 100% satisfaction guarantee if you aren’t satisfied. This gives trust. Let’s see how it goes. Very excited.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with this tooth whitening
customer_reviews.text: Didn't see any difference as far as whitening teeth. Actually caused blisters on my tongue an ulcers on my gums. Flavor was to strong of taste for my liking.

customer_reviews.title: Clean, refreshing, whiter teeth!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. It makes my teeth feel clean and refreshed with the mint flavor. And my teeth are starting to become white. I highly recommend to everyone!

customer_reviews.title: Great charcoal toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: This is great charcoal toothpaste. It really whiten my teeth. I like it that it's organic and would buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.text: For a toothpaste consistency should be more dense. Very watery

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Best toothpaste in the market as far as I’m concerned!

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well but don't whitens better than powder active charcoal.
customer_reviews.text: It does not make a great difference. Active charcoal powder whitens better than this. Cleans well but gives me sensitivity.

customer_reviews.title: Wintergreen, not mint
customer_reviews.text: Nice size toothpaste, reasonably priced. Do not care for the wintergreen flavor. Advertised as "mint" , not wintergreen.

customer_reviews.title: Love this tootpaste
customer_reviews.text: Works great, tastes great! Texture is good and Will buy again.

customer_reviews.text: Great flavor, texture and color. Definitely cleansing and a great paste to add to my routine. Glad I found this!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste works great. It leaves your teeth feeling very clean, like they were just polished. After two weeks I feel like my teeth are whiter and brighter. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Milks

customer_reviews.title: FDA
customer_reviews.text: Was told this has not been approved by the FDA?
customer_reviews.author: GC

product_meta.title: Organic Activated Charcoal Toothpaste With Bamboo - Mint Flavor - Teeth Whitening - Destroy Bad Breath - Fluoride Free - Stain Remover
product_meta.description:
Defining Stylez Charcoal Bamboo Teeth Whitening Toothpaste Has Been Prepared To Bring Out The Best Results Quickly & Effectively. 
Created With The Highest Quality Of Ingredients That Have Been Proven To Be Very Effective For Every Day Use To Eliminate The Following. 

We Import The Finest Organic Materials Make That Our Exclusive Charcoal Toothpaste.Our Doors Are Open For Tours.Follow GMP & FDA Guidelines.
The Perfect Charcoal Toothpaste Gives You The Full Benefits Of This Natural Organic Charcoal:  * Teeth Whitenener
 * Minty Fresh Breath
 * Fluoride Free
 * Organic Natural Ingredients
 * Anti Bacterial
 * Improved Dental Health
 * Smile Bright All Natural
 * 
 * 100% Satisfaction Guarantee! If you're not completely satisfied, you can keep the bottle (it's on us) AND get a full refund. NO QUESTIONS ASKED.

feature_bullets: ► ACTIVATED CHARCOAL BAMBOO ORGANIC FLUORIDE FREE TOOTHPASTE
► OUR ORGANIC TEETH WHITENING AND STAIN REMOVER - Is infused with our organic activated charcoal to remove tough on stains and give you bright pearly whites!
► FLUORIDE FREE NON GMO - Ditch your harmful chemicals, utilize our proven formula to strengthen enamel, polish your teeth and leave your mouth feeling clean and fresh!
► ORGANIC MINT - Our organic mint leaves not only sooth your mouth and give you fresh breath. It also acts as an anti inflammatory to combat gingiovites and give you a bright healthy smile.
► 100% GUARANTEED ► Defining Stylez Is Covered By Our Money Back Guarantee, No Questions Asked.
